```html
Younger investors are driving interest in alternative asset classes

Publication Date: [Insert Date Here] Source: Stock Market News

As younger investors increasingly take on active roles in wealth management, there is a noteworthy shift towards alternative asset classes like private equity and private credit.

  • Younger investors are establishing family offices for professional wealth management.
  • Interest in diversification and higher returns is increasing among younger investors.
  • Equity now accounts for up to two-thirds of investment portfolios.
  • There is a growing appetite for alternative investment funds (AIFs) and private equity.
"Additionally, there is a growing interest in alternative asset classes, including private equity and private credit, as younger investors prioritise diversification and seek higher returns." - Umang Papneja, CEO of Julius Baer India.

This trend indicates a significant shift in investment strategies among younger generations, highlighting their focus on diversification and increased returns.
```

title: Realme 14x 5G to launch with 6000mAh battery, under Rs 15000: Launching on December 18 - India TV News
summary:
Realme 14x 5G to launch with 6000mAh battery, under Rs 15000: Launching on December 18

Publication Date: December 15, 2024 Source: India TV News

Realme is set to launch its latest mid-range smartphone, the Realme 14x 5G, in India on December 18. This smartphone will feature a massive 6000mAh battery and IP69 rating, aimed at the budget segment.

  • The device will be available in three RAM variants, including an 8GB RAM and 256GB storage model.
  • It boasts a 6.67-inch HD+ IPS LCD display, ideal for streaming and gaming.
  • The 14x 5G features advanced water and dust resistance with its IP69 rating, making it suitable for tough conditions.
  • Equipped with a fingerprint scanner integrated into the power button for added security.
  • Expected to launch under Rs 15,000, potentially becoming the world’s cheapest IP69-rated smartphone.
  • Available for purchase on Realme’s official website and Flipkart.
"The device might be titled the world’s cheapest IP69-rated smartphone."

In conclusion, the Realme 14x 5G aims to provide exceptional features and durability at an affordable price point, making it an attractive option for budget-conscious consumers.

title: Companies alert as along come AI web spiders - The Economic Times

summary:
```html

Gadgets Weekly: Samsung Galaxy S24 Enterprise Edition and more

Published: 15 December 2024, 00:30 IST

Technology companies have launched a range of personal technology products including smartphones, security cameras, and accessories during the week of December 9-15, 2024.

  • Samsung introduced Galaxy S24 and S24 Ultra Enterprise Edition with enhanced security features and a 12-month subscription to the Knox Suite.
  • Epson released the CW-C8050 label printer, which minimizes printing costs and boosts productivity with a high-yield ink pack system.
  • Panasonic unveiled the AI-powered surveillance camera with advanced object detection and enhanced performance capabilities.
  • Portronics launched the Vayu 5.0 tyre inflator, which comes with a rechargeable battery and user-friendly controls.
  • Blaupunkt introduced the BTW300 Moksha+ TWS earphones, featuring Active Noise Cancellation and 50 hours of playtime.
  • Asus plans to launch new AI-integrated laptops at CES 2025, aimed at enhancing user experience and productivity.
  • Reliance and BPL launched a new line of Home Theatre LED TVs equipped with advanced audio features.
  • Dayananda Sagar University joined OPPO India’s initiative to raise awareness about e-waste management.
  • NCERT partnered with YouTube to provide reliable educational content for students across grades 1-12.
  • Nothing has launched a Snake game widget on its smartphones, adding a nostalgic feature for users.
“Generation Green embodies our commitment to the Government of India's Net-Zero vision.” - Rakesh Bhardwaj, Head of Public Affairs at OPPO India.

This week saw a significant display of innovation in personal technology that emphasizes security, sustainability, and enhanced user experience, promising exciting developments for consumers and businesses alike.
```

summary:
Black Myth Producer Comments on Game Awards Loss

Date: October 2023 | Source: Game Rant

Feng Ji, producer of Black Myth: Wukong, has sparked controversy with comments about the game's loss at The Game Awards, despite receiving other accolades.

  • Feng Ji questioned the criteria for the Game of the Year award, leading to backlash from fans.
  • The game won the Players' Voice and Best Action Game awards, despite losing the Game of the Year title.
  • Feng Ji expressed frustration over the loss, stating he felt he came "all the way here for nothing."
  • Notably, Black Myth: Wukong is the lowest-rated game ever nominated for Game of the Year with an 82 score on OpenCritic.
"It's normal to be a little angry when you are so confident but not recognized by others." - Feng Ji

The controversy highlights the divide between fan expectations and the actual results of the awards. Fans of Black Myth: Wukong look forward to future updates and potential sequels.

title: ‘Quordle’ Hints And Answers For Sunday, December 15 - Forbes
summary:
‘Quordle’ Hints And Answers For Sunday, December 15

Publication Date: December 15, 2024 | Source: Forbes

Looking for Saturday’s Quordle hints and answers? You can find them here:

Hey, folks! Hints and the answers for today’s Quordle words are just ahead.

How To Play Quordle

Just start typing in words. You have four five-letter words to guess and nine attempts to find them all. The catch is that you play all four words simultaneously.

If you get a letter in the right place for any of the four words, it will light up in green. If a word contains a letter from one of your guesses but it’s in the wrong place, it will appear in yellow.

What Are Today’s Quordle Hints?

  • Word 1 (top left) hint — operated a car
  • Word 2 (top right) hint — one of a pair of poles that allow you to walk while you’re elevated from the ground
  • Word 3 (bottom left) hint — a type of fabric often used for bed sheets
  • Word 4 (bottom right) hint — a pro baseball player in San Francisco
  • Two of the words each have a pair of repeated letters
  • Today’s words start with D, S, L and G

What Are Today’s Quordle Answers?

Spoiler alert! Today’s words are...

  • DROVE
  • STILT
  • LINEN
  • GIANT

Be sure to check my blog for hints and the solution for Monday’s game if you need them.

title: Chinese flagship phones are great value for money, but they won't stay cheaper for much longer – here's why - TechRadar
summary:
Chinese flagship phones are great value for money, but they won't stay cheaper for much longer – here's why

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: TechRadar

The article discusses the changing landscape of Chinese flagship smartphones, emphasizing their increasing prices while maintaining high value and specifications, particularly in Western markets.

  • Chinese brands like Xiaomi and Oppo are making significant inroads in Western markets, including the UK and Australia.
  • The Xiaomi 14 Ultra retails for £1,299, surpassing some of the most expensive models from established brands.
  • Chinese manufacturers, previously focused on cheaper alternatives, are shifting toward offering high-end devices at competitive prices.
  • Upcoming models are expected to carry even higher price tags, indicating a trend toward premium pricing.

The modus operandi for Chinese flagship challengers has changed: where previously these companies sought to offer comparable performance at cheaper prices, now they're focused on delivering better performance at bigger prices.

The article concludes that consumers might want to secure a Chinese flagship phone soon, as the era of affordable high-end devices may soon be over.

title: Apple faces backlash over false AI news alert: 'Luigi Mangione shoots himself' - Hindustan Times
summary:
Apple faces backlash over false AI news alert: 'Luigi Mangione shoots himself'

Date: December 14, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Apple is facing criticism after its AI service erroneously sent a fake news alert about Luigi Mangione, wrongly attributed to the BBC. The broadcasting service has filed a complaint regarding the incident.

  • The BBC claimed that Apple's AI-generated alert claiming Mangione had shot himself was false.
  • Luigi Mangione is currently in custody in Pennsylvania, awaiting extradition, and did not harm himself.
  • The alert misrepresented a story involving Mangione, who is accused of a murder linked to the United Healthcare CEO.
  • The BBC emphasized the importance of trust in their reporting and has raised concerns with Apple.
  • This incident follows previous misrepresentations by Apple’s AI service, including a false alert about Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu.
“BBC News is the most trusted news media in the world,” a BBC spokesperson stated, stressing the need for trust in information published in their name.

This incident highlights the challenges and responsibilities faced by tech companies in managing AI-generated news and its implications for factual accuracy.

summary:
Google NotebookLM now lets you chat with AI podcast hosts: Here’s how to use it

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Indian Express

Google has introduced a new feature in its AI-powered notebook web app, NotebookLM, allowing users to engage in real-time conversations with AI podcast hosts.

  • Users can create AI-generated virtual podcasts using the Audio Overview feature.
  • The new Interactive mode lets users join the conversation with AI hosts and ask questions.
  • This feature is still experimental and is available with new Audio Overviews only.
  • NotebookLM is updated with Gemini 2.0 and a new unified interface with three panels: Sources, Chat, and Studio.
  • A subscription plan, NotebookLM Plus, offers enhanced features such as increased Audio Overviews and customizable notebooks.
“AI hosts may pause awkwardly before responding and may occasionally introduce inaccuracies.”

The latest features in NotebookLM aim to enhance user interaction and streamline the note-taking experience, making it a more engaging and productive tool for users.
